item.title: 瑞士寻求暂缓即将到来的美国关税冲击
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四开始征收全球关税的时间越来越短，瑞士政府正在努力争取华盛顿方面的缓和措施，因为上周美国宣布对欧洲国家的出口产品征收 39% 的关税，这令人震惊。【原文：With the hours ticking down before President Donald Trump’s global tariffs kick in Thursday, the Swiss government is scrambling win a reprieve from Washington after last week’s shock announcement of 39% duties on the European country’s exports.】

item.title: 什么是 VPN？它们会破坏在线安全规则吗？
item.description: 作为英国《网络安全法案》的一部分，英国引入了年龄验证规则，在此之后，伪装用户位置的应用程序大受欢迎。【原文：Apps that disguise a user’s location have surged in popularity after the UK introduced age-verification rules as part of its Online Safety Act.】

item.title: 瑞士总统和经济部长将飞赴美国会谈
item.description: 瑞士总统卡琳-凯勒-萨特（Karin Keller-Sutter）和经济部长居伊-帕梅林（Guy Parmelin）将于周二飞往美国，提出更具吸引力的贸易提议，以降低华盛顿征收的39%的关税。【原文：Switzerland’s President Karin Keller-Sutter and Economy Minister Guy Parmelin will fly to the US on Tuesday to present a more attractive trade offer in a bid to lower a 39% tariff imposed by Washington.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 MGX 公司考虑为人工智能投资基金筹资数十亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，总部位于阿布扎比的 MGX 公司正在考虑筹集数十亿美元第三方资金的计划，以加大对人工智能的投资。【原文：Abu Dhabi-based MGX is considering plans to raise billions of dollars in third-party capital as it looks to ramp up investments in artificial intelligence, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度顶级国有绿色能源公司酝酿首次地方债券销售
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最有价值的国营绿色能源公司 NTPC Green Energy Ltd. 正在考虑首次出售本币债券，加入了利用较低融资成本的公司浪潮。【原文：NTPC Green Energy Ltd., India’s most valuable state-run green energy firm, is considering its first local-currency bond sale, according to people familiar with the matter, joining a wave of companies tapping into lower funding costs.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司称沙特石油钻井平台减少是因为项目完工
item.description: 阿美石油公司（Aramco）首席执行官阿明-纳赛尔（Amin Nasser）说，在几个旨在维持生产能力的油田项目竣工后，沙特阿拉伯的活跃石油钻机数量有所下降。【原文：The number of active oil rigs in Saudi Arabia fell after several oil-field projects aimed at maintaining production capacity were completed, said Aramco Chief Executive Officer Amin Nasser.】

item.title: 印尼将公布石油交易商逃犯姓名并寻求国际刑警组织红色通缉令
item.description: 印尼计划宣布一名著名石油交易商为逃犯，并寻求国际社会帮助查找他的下落，作为涉及国有企业印尼国家石油公司（PT Pertamina）石油采购的全面贪污调查的一部分。【原文：Indonesia plans to declare a prominent oil trader a fugitive and seek international help to locate him as part of a sweeping graft probe involving oil procurement by state-owned PT Pertamina.】

item.title: 据说马斯达尔公司和 NBIM 公司入围伊比利亚-德拉公司出售投资组合的候选名单
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿布扎比国有能源公司马斯达尔（Masdar）、挪威主权财富基金挪威银行投资管理公司（Norges Bank Investment Management）和澳大利亚公司福特斯库有限公司（Fortescue Ltd.）是入围购买伊比德罗拉公司（Iberdrola SA）拥有的西班牙太阳能发电组合的竞标者之一。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s state-owned energy firm Masdar, Norwegian sovereign wealth fund Norges Bank Investment Management and Australian firm Fortescue Ltd. are among bidders shortlisted to buy a Spanish solar power portfolio owned by Iberdrola SA, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 西班尼寻求美国对俄罗斯钯金征收关税以促进其矿山发展
item.description: Sibanye Stillwater Ltd.公司拥有美国唯一在运营的钯金矿，该公司已要求唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府对从俄罗斯进口的金属征收反倾销税。【原文：Sibanye Stillwater Ltd., which owns the US’s only operating palladium mines, has asked President Donald Trump’s administration to impose anti-dumping duties on imports of the metal from Russia.】

item.title: 初步估计显示，2026 年英国公司最低工资将上涨 4
item.description: 明年，英国企业最低收入工人的工资成本将再次面临通胀冲击，这是近几个月来就业岗位减少的劳动密集型行业遭受的最新打击。【原文：UK businesses are facing another inflation-busting jump in wage costs for their lowest-paid workers next year, the latest blow to labor-intensive sectors that have shed jobs in recent months.】

item.title: 诺和诺德发布盈利预警后，Nykredit 下调丹麦经济增长预期
item.description: 丹麦最大的银行之一 Nykredit A/S 下调了对丹麦经济的展望，此前制药巨头诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）警告称盈利增长疲软，并引发了对更广泛经济放缓的担忧。【原文：Nykredit A/S, one of Denmark’s largest banks, slashed its outlook for the Danish economy after pharmaceutical giant Novo Nordisk A/S warned of weaker earnings growth and raised fears of a broader slowdown.】

item.title: 特朗普的美联储人选在利率问题上可能面临来自同事的阻力
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统不断呼吁大幅降低利率，并有能力改变美联储的领导层，这让人们更加关注货币政策的决策方式和决策人。【原文：President Donald Trump’s relentless calls for dramatic reductions in interest rates, along with his ability to make changes to the Federal Reserve’s leadership, is drawing more attention to the way monetary policy decisions are made — and the people who make them.】

item.title: 新兴市场因盈利和降息押注重拾涨势
item.description: 由于央行降息前景和对盈利的乐观情绪提振了风险情绪，新兴市场重拾涨势。【原文：Emerging markets resumed their rally as the prospect of central bank rate cuts and optimism about earnings boosted risk sentiment.】

item.title: 美联储即将降息，杰富瑞认为大型科技公司交易拥挤
item.description: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）公司的一位策略师表示，美联储可能准备引发股市制度变革，让小公司的表现好于大盘科技公司。【原文：The Federal Reserve could be poised to trigger a stock-market regime change that sees smaller companies perform better than megacap tech, according to a strategist at Jefferies.】

item.title: 首席执行官称英国石油公司石油交易因短期交易而强劲
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）通过坚持较短期的交易，在动荡的第二季度取得了比竞争对手更强的石油交易业绩。【原文：BP Plc achieved a stronger oil-trading performance than its rivals during a volatile second quarter by sticking to shorter-duration trades.】

item.title: 竞争白热化后，阿里巴巴将关闭类似好市多的中国门店
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）计划逐步关闭其最后一家类似于好市多（Costco）的会员制商店，这凸显了该公司在竞争激烈的中国零售业的退却。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. plans to gradually wind down the last of its Costco-like members-only stores, underscoring its retreat from a hyper-competitive Chinese retail arena.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行行长认为 2025 年后仍有降息空间
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，在2025年余下的时间里，菲律宾央行可能会再削减两个季度的货币政策，明年仍有继续宽松周期的空间。【原文：The Philippine central bank has room to continue its easing cycle next year after possibly two more quarter-point cuts for the rest of 2025, according to Governor Eli Remolona.】

item.title: 泰国对特朗普的零关税承诺仍限制美国进口
item.description: 泰国政府一位官员表示，泰国向唐纳德-特朗普总统承诺对美国商品实行近乎完全的市场准入，其中包括保护部分国内产业的关键限制，这也是东南亚国家与华盛顿达成关税协议的条件。【原文：Thailand’s pledge to President Donald Trump of near-total market access for US goods includes key limits to protect some domestic industries, according to a government official, laying out the Southeast Asian nation’s terms for a tariff deal with Washington.】

item.title: 瑞银在季度盈利超预期后扩大债务销售狂潮
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）在季度盈利好于预期之后，几天前刚刚发行了美元债券，现在又以两期票据的形式进入欧元债券市场。【原文：UBS Group AG is diving into the euro bond market with a two-tranche sale of notes, days after raising dollar debt following better-than-expected quarterly earnings.】
